fields.title: Products  - Requirements link
fields.sql:
SELECT p.product_copernicus_service AS "Service name",
       p.product_component AS "Component name",
       p.product_group AS "Product group",
       p.product_name AS "Product name",
       p.product_note AS "Product note",
       r.requirement_id AS "Requirement UID",
       r.requirement_name AS "Requirement name",
       r.requirement_note AS "Requirement note",
       r.requirement_dissemination AS "Requirement dissemination",
       r.requirement_quality_control_procedure AS "Requirement Quality Control Procedure",
       r.requirement_group AS "Requirement group",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_threshold AS "Requirement Uncertainty Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_breakthrough AS "Requirement Uncertainty Threshold",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_goal AS "Requirement Uncertainty Goal",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_threshold AS "Requirement Update Frequency Threshold",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_breakthrough AS "Requirement Update Frequency Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_goal AS "Requirement Update Frequency Goal",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Goal",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Goal",
       r.requirement_timeliness_threshold AS "Requirement Timeliness Threshold",
       r.requirement_timeliness_breakthrough AS "Requirement Timeliness Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_timeliness_goal AS "Requirement Timeliness Goal",
       r.requirement_scale_threshold AS "Requirement Scale Threshold",
       r.requirement_scale_breakthrough AS "Requirement Scale Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_scale_goal AS "Requirement Scale Goal",
       r.requirement_state AS "Requirement state",
       r.requirement_author AS "Requirement author",
       r.requirement_owner AS "Requirement owner",
       r.requirement_essential_variable AS "Requirement essential variables",
       pr.productrequirement_level_of_definition AS "Product requirement link Level of definition",
       pr.product_relevance AS "Product requirement link Relevance",
       pr.productrequirement_criticality AS " Product requirement link Criticality",
       pr.productrequirement_note AS "Product requirement link note",
       pr.productrequirement_barrier AS "Product requirement link Barrier",
       coalesce(dr.datarequirement_level_of_compliance, '') AS "Data requirement link Level of Compliance"
FROM insitu_product_view p
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
WHERE r.requirement_id is not null
ORDER BY UPPER(p.product_copernicus_service);
fields.description:
Use cases:
 1. List Requirements per given Product, Component, or Service
 2. List Requirements classified according to criticality per given Product, Component, or Service (filter by Criticality)
 3. List barriers per Product, Component, or Service
 4. List requirements with level_of_compliance different from “fully compliant” per given Service
5.  List main outstanding gaps per Service, Product, and Component ( by level of compliance)
6.  List  Requirements per given Product
7.  List Requirements with level_of_compliance “none” or “partially fulfilled” per given Service Component
8.  List Essential Requirements per given Product, Component, or Service (filter by Criticality)
9.  List Requirements per given Product, Component, or Service that are essential and not fulfilled (filter by Criticality and Level of Compliance)

Filtering done on the objects of the report:
- Products that have a link to at least one requirement.
- Requirements with at least one link to a product

fields.title: Products - Data  link
fields.sql:
SELECT p.product_copernicus_service AS "Service name",
       p.product_component AS "Component name",
       p.product_group AS "Product group",
       p.product_id AS "Product UID",
       p.product_name AS "Product name",
       p.product_area AS "Product area",
       d.data_id AS "Data UID",
       d.data_name AS "Data name",
       coalesce(d.data_area, '') AS "Data area",
       dr.datarequirement_information_costs AS "Data link to Requirement Information costs",
       dr.datarequirement_handling_costs AS "Data link to Requirement Handling costs"
FROM insitu_product_view p
INNER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
INNER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
INNER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
INNER JOIN insitu_data_view d ON d.data_id = dr.datarequirement_data_id
ORDER BY UPPER(p.product_copernicus_service);
fields.description:
Use cases:
1.  List Data  per given Product, Component, or Service
2.  List Data used by a given Product, Component, or Service. with (no) information/handling cost
3. Present a list of Data per Product group

Filtering done on the objects of the report:
- Products that have a link to at least one requirement which has at least one link to a data set.
- Data with at least one link to a requirement linked to a product

fields.title: Products without data or requirement
fields.sql:
SELECT
    p.product_copernicus_service AS "Service name",
    p.product_component AS "Component name",      
	p.product_id AS "Product UID",
	p.product_name AS "Product name",
   	count(DISTINCT r.requirement_id) AS "Requirement count",
    count(DISTINCT d.data_id) AS "Data count"
FROM insitu_product_view p
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_data_view d ON d.data_id = dr.datarequirement_data_id
GROUP BY p.product_copernicus_service, p.product_component, p.product_id, p.product_name
HAVING count(DISTINCT r.requirement_id) = 0 OR count(DISTINCT d.data_id) = 0
ORDER BY p.product_copernicus_service;
fields.description:
Use cases:
 1. List Products without data and/or requirements.

Filtering done on the objects of the report:
- Products which do not have a link to a requirement or to a data object

fields.title: Entrusted entity component statistics
fields.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT e.name AS "Entrusted entity",
                c.name AS "Component",

  (SELECT count(p.id)
   FROM insitu_product p
   WHERE p.component_id = c.id
     AND p._deleted = FALSE) AS "Count products per component",

  (SELECT count(p.id)
   FROM insitu_component cr
   INNER JOIN insitu_product p ON p.component_id = cr.id
   WHERE cr.entrusted_entity_id = e.id
     AND p._deleted = FALSE) AS "Count products per entrusted entity",
     
  (SELECT count(distinct r.id)
   FROM insitu_product p
   INNER JOIN insitu_productrequirement pr ON pr.product_id = p.id
   INNER JOIN insitu_requirement r ON pr.requirement_id = r.id
   WHERE p.component_id = c.id
     AND p._deleted = FALSE
     AND r._deleted = FALSE
     AND pr._deleted = FALSE) AS "Count requirements per component",

 (SELECT count(distinct r.id)
   FROM insitu_entrustedentity ee
   INNER JOIN insitu_component cr ON ee.id = cr.entrusted_entity_id
   INNER JOIN insitu_product p ON p.component_id = cr.id
   INNER JOIN insitu_productrequirement pr ON pr.product_id = p.id
   INNER JOIN insitu_requirement r ON pr.requirement_id = r.id
   WHERE cr.entrusted_entity_id = e.id
     AND p._deleted = FALSE
     AND r._deleted = FALSE
     AND pr._deleted = FALSE) AS "Count requirements per entrusted entity"

FROM insitu_entrustedentity e
INNER JOIN insitu_component c ON c.entrusted_entity_id = e.id
ORDER BY e.name;
fields.description:
Use cases:
 1. Count Requirements per Entrusted Entity
 2. Count Requirements per Component
 3. Count Products per Component
 4. Count Products per Entrusted Entity

Filtering done on the objects of the report:
- All Products are considered for the counting
- The requirements which have a link to a product of the selected component/entrusted entity are considered for the counting

fields.title: Data provider statistics
fields.sql:
SELECT dp.name AS "Data provider",
       CASE
           WHEN dp.is_network = TRUE THEN 'Yes'
           ELSE 'No'
       END as "Data provider Is network",
       count(d.id) AS "Number of data delivered"
FROM insitu_dataprovider dp
INNER JOIN insitu_dataproviderrelation dpr ON dpr.provider_id = dp.id
INNER JOIN insitu_data d ON dpr.data_id = d.id
WHERE dp._deleted = FALSE
  AND dpr._deleted = FALSE
  AND d._deleted = FALSE
GROUP BY dp.name, dp.is_network
ORDER BY UPPER(dp.name);
fields.description:
Use cases:
 1. List data providers which deliver data and a count of data delivered.

Filtering done on the objects of the report: 
- Data providers with at least one link to a data set

fields.title: Requirement Areas
fields.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT r.requirement_id AS "Requirement UID",
                r.requirement_name AS "Requirement name",
                p.product_area AS "Product area",
                coalesce(d.data_area, '') AS "Data area"
FROM insitu_product_view p
INNER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
INNER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
INNER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
INNER JOIN insitu_data_view d ON d.data_id = dr.datarequirement_data_id
ORDER BY r.requirement_id;
fields.description:
Use cases:
1. List all requirements and their related areas.

Filtering done on the objects of the report:
- Requirements with at least one link to a product and one link to a data object

fields.title: Data providers per countries
fields.sql:
SELECT dp.data_provider_id AS "Data provider UID",
       dp.data_provider_name AS "Data provider name",
       coalesce(dp.data_provider_type, '') AS "Data provider Provider type",
       dp.data_provider_country AS "Data provider country",
       dp.data_provider_is_network AS "Data provider Network flag",
       coalesce(dp.data_provider_network_name, '') AS "Data provider network name",
       coalesce(dp.data_provider_network_country, '') AS "Data provider network country",
       coalesce(dpd.product_component, '') AS "Product component",
       coalesce(dpd.product_copernicus_service, '') AS "Product copernicus service",
       coalesce(cast(dpd.data_id AS varchar), '') AS "Data UID",
       coalesce(dpd.data_name, '') AS "Data name",
       coalesce(dpd.dataproviderrelation_role, '-') AS "Data Provider role",
       coalesce(dpd.requirement_group, '-') AS "Requirement group",
       string_agg(DISTINCT dpd.data_area, ', ') AS "Data Area",
       dpd.data_policy AS "Data Policy",
       string_agg(DISTINCT dpd.data_geographical_coverage, ', ') AS "Data Geographical Coverage"
FROM insitu_dataprovider_special_view dp
INNER JOIN insitu_dataprovider_product_direct_view_report_7 dpd ON dpd.dataproviderrelation_provider_id = dp.data_provider_id
GROUP BY dp.data_provider_id,
         dp.data_provider_name,
         dp.data_provider_country,
         dp.data_provider_is_network,
         dpd.data_policy,
         coalesce(dp.data_provider_type, ''),
         coalesce(dp.data_provider_network_name, ''),
         coalesce(dp.data_provider_network_country, ''),
         coalesce(dpd.product_component, ''),
         coalesce(dpd.product_copernicus_service, ''),
         coalesce(cast(dpd.data_id AS varchar), ''),
         coalesce(dpd.data_name, ''),
         coalesce(dpd.dataproviderrelation_role, '-'),
         coalesce(dpd.requirement_group, '-') ;
fields.description:
Use cases:
1.  List Data Providers for a given Country or Network
2.  List all commercial Data Providers for a given Country or Network (filter by provider type)

Filtering done on the objects of the report:
- All Data Providers are shown in this report
- Data sets which have a link to a component and service through  a product and a requirement

fields.title: Products - Requirements - Dataset - Data Providers link
fields.sql:
SELECT p.product_copernicus_service AS "Service name",
       p.product_entrusted_entity AS "Entrusted Entity",
       p.product_component AS "Component name",
       p.product_group AS "Product group",
       p.product_name AS "Product name",
       p.product_note AS "Product note",
       p.product_area AS "Product area",
       coalesce(pr.productrequirement_criticality, '') AS "Product link to Requirement Criticality",
       coalesce(pr.productrequirement_level_of_definition, '') AS "Product link to Requirement Level of definition",
       coalesce(pr.product_relevance, '') AS "Product link to Requirement Relevance",
       coalesce(cast(r.requirement_id as varchar), '') AS "Requirement UID",
       coalesce(r.requirement_name, '') AS "Requirement name",
       coalesce(r.requirement_group, '') AS "Requirement group",
       coalesce(r.requirement_dissemination, '') AS "Requirement Dissemination",
       coalesce(r.requirement_update_frequency_threshold, '') AS "Requirement Update Frequency Threshold",
       coalesce(r.requirement_update_frequency_breakthrough, '') AS "Requirement Update Frequency Breakthrough",
       coalesce(r.requirement_update_frequency_goal, '') AS "Requirement Update Frequency Goal",
       coalesce(r.requirement_quality_control_procedure, '') AS "Requirement Quality Control Procedure",
       coalesce(r.requirement_timeliness_threshold, '') AS "Requirement Timeliness Threshold",
       coalesce(r.requirement_timeliness_breakthrough, '') AS "Requirement Timeliness Breakthrough",
       coalesce(r.requirement_timeliness_goal, '') AS "Requirement Timeliness Goal",
       coalesce(r.requirement_uncertainty_threshold, '') AS "Requirement Uncertainty Breakthrough",
       coalesce(r.requirement_uncertainty_breakthrough, '') AS "Requirement Uncertainty Threshold",
       coalesce(r.requirement_uncertainty_goal, '') AS "Requirement Uncertainty Goal",
       coalesce(r.requirement_scale_threshold, '') AS "Requirement Scale Threshold",
       coalesce(r.requirement_scale_breakthrough, '') AS "Requirement Scale Breakthrough",
       coalesce(r.requirement_scale_goal, '') AS "Requirement Scale Goal",
       coalesce(r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_threshold, '') AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Threshold",
       coalesce(r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_breakthrough, '') AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Breakthrough",
       coalesce(r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_goal, '') AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Goal",
       coalesce(r.requirement_vertical_resolution_threshold, '') AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Threshold",
       coalesce(r.requirement_vertical_resolution_breakthrough, '') AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Breakthrough",
       coalesce(r.requirement_vertical_resolution_goal, '') AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Goal",
       r.requirement_essential_variable AS "Requirement essential variables",
       coalesce(cast(dr.datarequirement_information_costs as varchar), '') AS "Data link to Requirement Information costs",
       coalesce(cast(dr.datarequirement_handling_costs as varchar), '') AS "Data link to Requirement Handling costs",
       coalesce(dr.datarequirement_level_of_compliance, '') AS "Data link to Requirement Level of compliance",
       coalesce(cast(d.data_id as varchar), '') AS "Data UID",
       coalesce(d.data_name, '') AS "Data name",
       coalesce(dr.datarequirement_note, '') AS "Data link note",
       coalesce(d.data_area, '') AS "Data area",
       coalesce(d.data_format, '') AS "Data format",
       coalesce(d.data_type, '') AS "Data type",
       coalesce(d.data_update_frequency, '') AS "Data Update Frequency",
       coalesce(d.data_policy, '') AS "Data Policy",
       coalesce(d.data_quality_control_procedure, '') AS "Data Quality Control Procedure",
       coalesce(d.data_timeliness, '') AS "Data Timeliness",
       concat(cast(d.data_start_time_coverage as varchar), '-',cast(d.data_end_time_coverage as varchar))  AS "Data Temporal",
       coalesce(d.data_dissemination, '') AS "Data Dissemination",
       coalesce(d.data_inspiretheme, '') AS "Data Inspire theme",
       coalesce(cast(dp.data_provider_id as varchar), '') AS "Data provider UID",
       coalesce(dp.data_provider_name, '') AS "Data provider name",
       coalesce(dp.data_provider_type, '') AS "Data provider Provider type"
FROM insitu_product_view p
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_data_view d ON d.data_id = dr.datarequirement_data_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_dataproviderrelation_view dpr ON d.data_id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_data_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_dataprovider_without_networks_view dp ON dp.data_provider_id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_provider_id
fields.description:
Use cases:
1. List Data Providers per given Product, Component, or Service
2. List all commercial Data Providers contributing to Copernicus per Service (filter by provider type)
3. List Data providers (networks) contributing to Copernicus per Entrusted Entity
4.  List of Service, Product and Component to which a selected Data provider contribute.
5.  List  Data Providers per Product, Component or Service
6.  List Networks and DataProviders delivering data to the selected service/entrusted Entities
7.  List Data Providers deliver essential data to us  (filter by Level of Compliance)

Filtering done on the objects of the report:
- All Products are shown in this report (some exceptions might appear for duplicated names)
- Requirements which have at least one link to a product
- Data objects which have at least one link to a requirement
- Data providers which have at least one link to a data object

fields.title: Data  - Requirements compliance
fields.sql:
SELECT p.product_copernicus_service AS "Service name",
       p.product_component AS "Component name",
       p.product_id AS "Product UID",
       p.product_name AS "Product name",
       p.product_area AS "Product area",
       p.product_group AS "Product group",
       r.requirement_id AS "Requirement UID",
       r.requirement_name AS "Requirement name",
       d.data_id AS "Data UID",
       d.data_name AS "Data name",
       coalesce(d.data_area, '') AS "Data area",
       coalesce(dr.datarequirement_level_of_compliance, '') AS "Data link to Requirement Level of Compliance"
FROM insitu_product_view p
INNER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
INNER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
INNER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
INNER JOIN insitu_data_view d ON d.data_id = dr.datarequirement_data_id
ORDER BY UPPER(p.product_copernicus_service);
fields.description:
Use cases:
1.  List Data fully compliant with Requirements ( filter by Level of compliance)

Filtering done on the objects of the report: 
- Products that have a link to at least one requirement which has at least one link to a data set.
- Requirements with at least one link to a data set and at least one link to a product
- Data with at least one link to a requirement linked to a product

fields.title: Data report
fields.sql:
SELECT d.data_id AS "Data UID",
	   d.data_name AS "Data name",
       d.data_note AS "Data note",
	   coalesce(d.data_area, '') AS "Data area",
       coalesce(d.data_format, '') AS "Data format",
       coalesce(d.data_policy, '') AS "Data policy",
       coalesce(d.data_type, '') AS "Data type",
       coalesce(d.data_timeliness, '') AS "Data Timeliness",
       coalesce(d.data_update_frequency, '') AS "Data Update frequency",
       coalesce(d.data_quality_control_procedure, '') AS "Data Quality Control Procedure",
       coalesce(d.data_dissemination, '') AS "Data Dissemination",
       coalesce(d.data_essential_variable, '') AS "Data Essential variable domain",
       coalesce(d.data_inspiretheme, '') AS "Data Inspire theme",
       coalesce(cast(d.data_start_time_coverage as varchar), '') AS "Data Start time coverage",
       coalesce(cast(d.data_end_time_coverage as varchar), '') AS "Data End time coverage",
       d.data_state AS "Data state",
       coalesce(d.data_status, '') AS "Data status"
FROM insitu_data_view d
ORDER BY UPPER(d.data_name);
fields.description:
Use cases:
1. List INSPIRE themes covered by Data

Filtering done on the objects of the report:
- All Data sets are shown in this report

fields.title: Special report 1
fields.sql:
SELECT p.product_copernicus_service AS "Copernicus Service name",
       p.product_entrusted_entity AS "Entrusted Entity",
       p.product_component AS "Component name",
       p.product_group AS "Product group",
       p.product_name AS "Product name",
       p.product_note AS "Product note",
       p.product_area AS "Product area",
       p.product_status AS "Product status",
       pr.productrequirement_level_of_definition AS "Product Level of definition",
       pr.product_relevance AS "Product relevance",
       pr.productrequirement_criticality AS "Product Criticality",
       pr.productrequirement_barrier AS "Product Barriers",
       pr.productrequirement_note AS "Product Note of linked Requirement",
	   r.requirement_group AS "Requirement group",
       r.requirement_name AS "Requirement name",
       r.requirement_note AS "Requirement note",
       r.requirement_state AS "Requirement state",
       r.requirement_author AS "Requirement author (created by)",
       r.requirement_owner AS "Requirement owner",
       r.requirement_dissemination AS "Requirement dissemination",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_threshold AS "Requirement Update Frequency Threshold",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_breakthrough AS "Requirement Update Frequency Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_goal AS "Requirement Update Frequency Goal",
       r.requirement_quality_control_procedure AS "Requirement Quality Control Procedure",
       r.requirement_timeliness_threshold AS "Requirement Timeliness Threshold",
       r.requirement_timeliness_breakthrough AS "Requirement Timeliness Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_timeliness_goal AS "Requirement Timeliness Goal",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_threshold AS "Requirement Uncertainty Threshold",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_breakthrough AS "Requirement Uncertainty Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_goal AS "Requirement Uncertainty Goal",
       r.requirement_scale_threshold AS "Requirement Scale Threshold",
       r.requirement_scale_breakthrough AS "Requirement Scale Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_scale_goal AS "Requirement Scale Goal",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Goal",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Goal",
       dr.datarequirement_level_of_compliance AS "Requirement level of compliance of linked Dataset",
       dr.datarequirement_information_costs AS "Requirement Data Information costs of linked Dataset",
       dr.datarequirement_information_costs AS "Requirement Data Handling costs of linked Dataset",
       dr.datarequirement_note AS "Requirement Note of linked Dataset",
       d.data_name AS "Data name",
       d.data_note AS "Data note",
       dp.data_provider_name AS "Data provider name",
       dp.data_provider_type AS "Data provider type name",
       dp.data_provider_country AS "Data provider country",
       dp.data_provider_network_name AS "Data provider network",
       d.data_area AS "Data area",
       d.data_type AS "Data type",
       d.data_format AS "Data format",
       d.data_policy AS "Data Policy",
       d.data_update_frequency AS "Data Update Frequency",
       d.data_state AS "Data State",
       d.data_status AS "Data Status",
       dp.data_provider_state AS "Data provider state",
       d.data_author AS "Data author",
       to_char(d.data_created_at, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI') AS "Data created ",
       to_char(d.data_updated_at,'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI') AS "Data updated",
       d.data_timeliness AS "Data timeliness",
       d.data_start_time_coverage AS "Data Start time coverage",
       d.data_end_time_coverage AS "Data End time coverage",
       d.data_quality_control_procedure AS "Data Quality Control Procedure",
       d.data_dissemination AS "Data Dissemination",
       d.data_inspiretheme AS "Data INSPIRE Theme Name",
       d.data_essential_variable AS "Data Essential Variable"
FROM insitu_product_view p
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_data_view d ON d.data_id = dr.datarequirement_data_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_dataproviderrelation_view dpr ON d.data_id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_data_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_dataprovider_view dp ON dp.data_provider_id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_provider_id
WHERE p.product_copernicus_service IN ('Copernicus Emergency Management Service', 'Copernicus Land Monitoring Service', 'Copernicus Security Service');
fields.description:
1.This report contains all relevant columns from products, requirements, data and data requirements for the following services:
    a) Copernicus Emergency Management Service
    b) Copernicus Land Monitoring Service
    c) Copernicus Security Service

fields.title: Special report 2
fields.sql:
SELECT p.product_copernicus_service AS "Copernicus Service name",
       p.product_entrusted_entity AS "Entrusted Entity",
       p.product_component AS "Component name",
       p.product_group AS "Product group",
       p.product_name AS "Product name",
       p.product_note AS "Product note",
       p.product_area AS "Product area",
       p.product_status AS "Product status",
       pr.productrequirement_level_of_definition AS "Product Level of definition",
       pr.product_relevance AS "Product relevance",
       pr.productrequirement_criticality AS "Product Criticality",
       pr.productrequirement_barrier AS "Product Barriers",
       pr.productrequirement_note AS "Product Note of linked Requirement",
	   r.requirement_group AS "Requirement group",
       r.requirement_name AS "Requirement name",
       r.requirement_note AS "Requirement note",
       r.requirement_state AS "Requirement state",
       r.requirement_author AS "Requirement Author (created by)",
       r.requirement_owner AS "Requirement owner",
       r.requirement_dissemination AS "Requirement dissemination",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_threshold AS "Requirement Update Frequency Threshold",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_breakthrough AS "Requirement Update Frequency Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_goal AS "Requirement Update Frequency Goal",
       r.requirement_quality_control_procedure AS "Requirement Quality Control Procedure",
       r.requirement_timeliness_threshold AS "Requirement Timeliness Threshold",
       r.requirement_timeliness_breakthrough AS "Requirement Timeliness Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_timeliness_goal AS "Requirement Timeliness Goal",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_threshold AS "Requirement Uncertainty Threshold",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_breakthrough AS "Requirement Uncertainty Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_goal AS "Requirement Uncertainty Goal",
       r.requirement_scale_threshold AS "Requirement Scale Threshold",
       r.requirement_scale_breakthrough AS "Requirement Scale Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_scale_goal AS "Requirement Scale Goal",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Goal",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Goal",
       dr.datarequirement_level_of_compliance AS "Requirement level of compliance of linked Dataset",
       dr.datarequirement_information_costs AS "Requirement Data Information costs of linked Dataset",
       dr.datarequirement_information_costs AS "Requirement Data Handling costs of linked Dataset",
       dr.datarequirement_note AS "Requirement Note of linked Dataset",
       d.data_name AS "Data name",
       d.data_note AS "Data note",
       dp.data_provider_name AS "Data provider name",
       dp.data_provider_type AS "Data provider type name",
       dp.data_provider_country AS "Data provider country",
       dp.data_provider_network_name AS "Data provider network",
       d.data_area AS "Data area",
       d.data_type AS "Data type",
       d.data_format AS "Data format",
       d.data_policy AS "Data Policy",
       d.data_update_frequency AS "Data Update Frequency",
       d.data_state AS "Data State",
       d.data_status AS "Data Status",
       dp.data_provider_state AS "Data provider state",
       d.data_author AS "Data author",
       to_char(d.data_created_at, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI') AS "Data created ",
       to_char(d.data_updated_at, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI') AS "Data updated",
       d.data_timeliness AS "Data timeliness",
       d.data_start_time_coverage AS "Data Start time coverage",
       d.data_end_time_coverage AS "Data End time coverage",
       d.data_quality_control_procedure AS "Data Quality Control Procedure",
       d.data_dissemination AS "Data Dissemination",
       d.data_inspiretheme AS "Data INSPIRE Theme Name",
       d.data_essential_variable AS "Data Essential Variable"
FROM insitu_product_view p
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_data_view d ON d.data_id = dr.datarequirement_data_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_dataproviderrelation_view dpr ON d.data_id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_data_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_dataprovider_view dp ON dp.data_provider_id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_provider_id
WHERE p.product_copernicus_service IN ('Copernicus Marine Environment Monitoring Service', 'Copernicus Climate Change Service', 'Copernicus Atmosphere Monitoring Service');
fields.description:
1.This report contains all relevant columns from products, requirements, data and data requirements for the following services:
    a) Copernicus Emergency Management Service
    b) Copernicus Land Monitoring Service
    c) Copernicus Security Service

fields.title: Products  - Requirements link
fields.sql:
SELECT p.product_copernicus_service AS "Service name",
       p.product_component AS "Component name",
       p.product_group AS "Product group",
       p.product_name AS "Product name",
       p.product_note AS "Product note",
       r.requirement_id AS "Requirement UID",
       r.requirement_name AS "Requirement name",
       r.requirement_note AS "Requirement note",
       r.requirement_dissemination AS "Requirement dissemination",
       r.requirement_quality_control_procedure AS "Requirement Quality Control Procedure",
       r.requirement_group AS "Requirement group",
 	   r.requirement_uncertainty_threshold AS "Requirement Uncertainty Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_breakthrough AS "Requirement Uncertainty Threshold",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_goal AS "Requirement Uncertainty Goal",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_threshold AS "Requirement Update Frequency Threshold",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_breakthrough AS "Requirement Update Frequency Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_goal AS "Requirement Update Frequency Goal",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Goal",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Goal",
       r.requirement_timeliness_threshold AS "Requirement Timeliness Threshold",
       r.requirement_timeliness_breakthrough AS "Requirement Timeliness Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_timeliness_goal AS "Requirement Timeliness Goal",
       r.requirement_scale_threshold AS "Requirement Scale Threshold",
       r.requirement_scale_breakthrough AS "Requirement Scale Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_scale_goal AS "Requirement Scale Goal",
       r.requirement_state AS "Requirement state",
       pr.productrequirement_level_of_definition AS "Product requirement link Level of definition",
       pr.product_relevance AS "Product requirement link Relevance",
       pr.productrequirement_criticality AS " Product requirement link Criticality",
       pr.productrequirement_note AS "Product requirement link note",
       pr.productrequirement_barrier AS "Product requirement link Barrier",
       coalesce(dr.datarequirement_level_of_compliance, '') AS "Data requirement link Level of Compliance"
FROM insitu_product_view p
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
WHERE r.requirement_id is not null
ORDER BY UPPER(p.product_copernicus_service);
fields.description:
Use cases:
 1. List Requirements per given Product, Component, or Service
 2. List Requirements classified according to criticality per given Product, Component, or Service (filter by Criticality)
 3. List barriers per Product, Component, or Service
 4. List requirements with level_of_compliance different from “fully compliant” per given Service
5.  List main outstanding gaps per Service, Product, and Component ( by level of compliance)
6.  List  Requirements per given Product
7.  List Requirements with level_of_compliance “none” or “partially fullfilled” per given Service Component
8.  List Essential Requirements per given Product, Component, or Service (filter by Criticality)
9.  List Requirements per given Product, Component, or Service that are essential and not fulfilled (filter by Criticality and Level of Compliance)

fields.title: Products - Requirements - Dataset - Data Providers link
fields.sql:
SELECT p.product_copernicus_service AS "Service name",
       p.product_entrusted_entity AS "Entrusted Entity",
       p.product_component AS "Component name",
       p.product_group AS "Product group",
       p.product_name AS "Product name",
       p.product_area AS "Product area",
       coalesce(pr.productrequirement_criticality, '') AS "Product link to Requirement Criticality",
       coalesce(pr.productrequirement_level_of_definition, '') AS "Product link to Requirement Level of definition",
       coalesce(pr.product_relevance, '') AS "Product link to Requirement Relevance",
       coalesce(cast(r.requirement_id AS varchar), '') AS "Requirement UID",
       coalesce(r.requirement_name, '') AS "Requirement name",
       coalesce(r.requirement_note, '') AS "Requirement note",
       coalesce(r.requirement_group, '') AS "Requirement group",
       coalesce(r.requirement_dissemination, '') AS "Requirement Dissemination",
       coalesce(r.requirement_update_frequency_threshold, '') AS "Requirement Update Frequency Threshold",
       coalesce(r.requirement_update_frequency_breakthrough, '') AS "Requirement Update Frequency Breakthrough",
       coalesce(r.requirement_update_frequency_goal, '') AS "Requirement Update Frequency Goal",
       coalesce(r.requirement_quality_control_procedure, '') AS "Requirement Quality Control Procedure",
       coalesce(r.requirement_timeliness_threshold, '') AS "Requirement Timeliness Threshold",
       coalesce(r.requirement_timeliness_breakthrough, '') AS "Requirement Timeliness Breakthrough",
       coalesce(r.requirement_timeliness_goal, '') AS "Requirement Timeliness Goal",
       coalesce(r.requirement_uncertainty_threshold, '') AS "Requirement Uncertainty Breakthrough",
       coalesce(r.requirement_uncertainty_breakthrough, '') AS "Requirement Uncertainty Threshold",
       coalesce(r.requirement_uncertainty_goal, '') AS "Requirement Uncertainty Goal",
       coalesce(r.requirement_scale_threshold, '') AS "Requirement Scale Threshold",
       coalesce(r.requirement_scale_breakthrough, '') AS "Requirement Scale Breakthrough",
       coalesce(r.requirement_scale_goal, '') AS "Requirement Scale Goal",
       coalesce(r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_threshold, '') AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Threshold",
       coalesce(r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_breakthrough, '') AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Breakthrough",
       coalesce(r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_goal, '') AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Goal",
       coalesce(r.requirement_vertical_resolution_threshold, '') AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Threshold",
       coalesce(r.requirement_vertical_resolution_breakthrough, '') AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Breakthrough",
       coalesce(r.requirement_vertical_resolution_goal, '') AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Goal",
       r.requirement_essential_variable AS "Requirement essential variables",
       coalesce(cast(dr.datarequirement_information_costs AS varchar), '') AS "Data link to Requirement Information costs",
       coalesce(cast(dr.datarequirement_handling_costs AS varchar), '') AS "Data link to Requirement Handling costs",
       coalesce(dr.datarequirement_level_of_compliance, '') AS "Data link to Requirement Level of compliance",
       coalesce(cast(d.data_id AS varchar), '') AS "Data UID",
       coalesce(d.data_name, '') AS "Data name",
       coalesce(dr.datarequirement_note, '') AS "Data link note",
       coalesce(d.data_area, '') AS "Data area",
       coalesce(d.data_format, '') AS "Data format",
       coalesce(d.data_type, '') AS "Data type",
       coalesce(d.data_update_frequency, '') AS "Data Update Frequency",
       coalesce(d.data_policy, '') AS "Data Policy",
       coalesce(d.data_quality_control_procedure, '') AS "Data Quality Control Procedure",
       coalesce(d.data_timeliness, '') AS "Data Timeliness",
       concat(cast(d.data_start_time_coverage AS varchar), '-', cast(d.data_end_time_coverage AS varchar)) AS "Data Temporal",
       coalesce(d.data_dissemination, '') AS "Data Dissemination",
       coalesce(cast(dp.data_provider_id AS varchar), '') AS "Data provider UID",
       coalesce(dp.data_provider_name, '') AS "Data provider name",
       coalesce(dp.data_provider_type, '') AS "Data provider Provider type"
FROM insitu_product_view p
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_data_view d ON d.data_id = dr.datarequirement_data_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_dataproviderrelation_view dpr ON d.data_id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_data_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN insitu_dataprovider_without_networks_view dp ON dp.data_provider_id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_provider_id
fields.description:
Use cases:
1. List Data Providers per given Product, Component, or Service
2. List all commercial Data Providers contributing to Copernicus per Service (filter by provider type)
3. List Data providers (networks) contributing to Copernicus per Entrusted Entity
4.  List of Service, Product and Component to which a selected Data provider contribute.
5.  List  Data Providers per Product, Component or Service
6.  List Networks and DataProviders delivering data to the selected service/entrusted Entities
7.  List Data Providers deliver essential data to us  (filter by Level of Compliance)

fields.title: Data providers per Countries and Components and No of Data per data providers
fields.sql:
SELECT dp.data_provider_id AS "Data provider UID",
       dp.data_provider_name AS "Data provider name",
       coalesce(dpd.product_component, '') AS "Product component",
       coalesce(dp.data_provider_network_name, '') AS "Data provider network name",
       data_provider_country AS "Data provider country",
       dp.data_id_count AS "Number of Data per DP"
FROM insitu_dataprovider_special_view_for_report_7_bis dp
INNER JOIN insitu_dataprovider_product_direct_view_report_7 dpd ON dpd.dataproviderrelation_provider_id = dp.data_provider_id;
fields.description:
Use cases:
1.Filter per ‘Data Provider Country’
2. Filter per ‘Product component’
3. List data providers networks and data count per data provider

fields.title: Requirements
fields.sql:
SELECT r.requirement_id AS "Requirement UID",
       r.requirement_name AS "Requirement name",
       r.requirement_note AS "Requirement note",
       r.requirement_dissemination AS "Requirement dissemination",
       r.requirement_quality_control_procedure AS "Requirement Quality Control Procedure",
       r.requirement_group AS "Requirement group",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_threshold AS "Requirement Uncertainty Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_breakthrough AS "Requirement Uncertainty Threshold",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_goal AS "Requirement Uncertainty Goal",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_threshold AS "Requirement Update Frequency Threshold",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_breakthrough AS "Requirement Update Frequency Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_goal AS "Requirement Update Frequency Goal",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Goal",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Goal",
       r.requirement_timeliness_threshold AS "Requirement Timeliness Threshold",
       r.requirement_timeliness_breakthrough AS "Requirement Timeliness Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_timeliness_goal AS "Requirement Timeliness Goal",
       r.requirement_scale_threshold AS "Requirement Scale Threshold",
       r.requirement_scale_breakthrough AS "Requirement Scale Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_scale_goal AS "Requirement Scale Goal",
       r.requirement_state AS "Requirement state",
       r.requirement_author AS "Requirement author",
       r.requirement_owner AS "Requirement owner",
       r.requirement_essential_variable AS "Requirement essential variables"
FROM insitu_requirement_view r
order by r.requirement_id;
fields.description:
Use cases:
 1. List all Requirements with all their attributes
